attributes.additional_details:
Stop/Ban Facebook Secret Groups.

These groups allow the networking of bullying, hate crimes, homophobia, paedophilia etc.

These secret groups exist without scrutiny and only those who are like minded will be in the groups. The general public will be unaware the secret groups exist let alone the content.

rejection.details: Not entirely clear how you think the government should act.  The internet is self-regulating; secret groups are, by definition, secret?
